name: Jason Fleece
description: Embedded in the Four Corners zone, documenting Horizon Corporation’s activities. Collected, persistent, emotionally distant.
notes: Believes his father was involved in the original incident. Sends dispatches via encrypted radio.

name: Kane Fleece
description: Jason’s estranged father. Vanished shortly after the Gateway anomaly was discovered. May have entered the site before lockdown.
notes: Mentioned in redacted reports and internal memos. Motivations unclear.

name: Kelsey Rowe
description: Jason’s last known contact outside the zone. Receives encrypted updates and curates them for potential release.
notes: Struggling to verify Jason’s materials due to military interference and increasing media blackouts.

name: Hoc
description: Ruthless and resourceful outsider attempting to uncover the truth. Known to infiltrate military perimeters and sabotage Horizon equipment.
notes: Believes Horizon is covering up a mass casualty event. May be following Jason’s trail.
